form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 PLACE MEDI AL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS NEW DELHI FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo. Day, Yr.) 02 09 93 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at NEW DELHI INDIA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX I certify that on the above date I examined SANDHU CHANNAN (Mo. Day Yr SINGH 07 07 06 F M WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON A 625611 JALANDHAR 12.2.88 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale. Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Fibrotic leisons are present in the left upper zone. Not Done Both hila are prominent DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DR. AGGARWAL DATE READ 9th Feb'93 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: VDRL ELISA METHOD DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY DR. N.P.S. CHAWLA 9th Feb'93 DR. N.P.S.CHAWLA 11th Feb'93 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT (S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS : KYPHOSCOLIOSIS., DEFECTIVE VISION CLASS B 3 : FIBROTIC LESIONS ARE PRESENT IN CATARACT RT. EYE., APHAKIA.LT THE LEFT UPPER ZONE. BOTH HILA ARE PROMINENT APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. STEPHEN Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE DR. N.P.S.CHAWLA 11th Feb'93 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 *U.S. Government Printing Office: 1991 286-971/20115 REVISED 2-88 DEPT. OF STATE
